quotes.text: "The best way to predict your future is to create it."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "I am a slow walker, but I never walk back."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "You can have anything you want, if you want it badly enough."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "What a man can be, he must be."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "The story of the human race is the story of men and women selling themselves short."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "We are capable of greater things than we realize."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "If you plan on being anything less than you are capable of being, you will probably be unhappy all the days of your life."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Be independent of the good opinion of other people."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Life’s challenges are not supposed to paralyze you; they’re supposed to help you discover who you are."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Find your voice and sing your song; the world needs to hear it."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "You have the strength to make the impossible possible."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Great change starts with small steps—just start."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Empower yourself by taking the first step toward your dreams."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Man's greatness lies in his power of thought."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The heart has its reasons, which reason knows nothing of."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "We must learn our limits. We are all something, but none of us are everything."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Happiness is neither without us nor within us. It is in God, both without us and within us."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Your life only gets better when you get better."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Decide exactly what you want. Write it down. Make a plan to achieve it. Work on it every single day."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Don’t dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The secret of living a life of excellence is merely a matter of thinking thoughts of excellence."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "When you have a sense of purpose, no obstacle can stop you."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Success is the peace of mind in knowing you did your best."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The start is what stops most people."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The more you know about your opponent, the better you can prepare."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Strive for perfection, settle for excellence."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "It's not the will to win that matters—everyone has that. It's the will to prepare to win that matters."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "You cannot strengthen the weak by weakening the strong."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Give me six hours to chop down a tree, and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Character is like a tree and reputation like its shadow."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "It is not best to swap horses while crossing the river."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "The philosophy of the schoolroom in one generation will be the philosophy of government in the next."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "A musician must make music, an artist must paint, a poet must write, if he is to be ultimately at peace with himself."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "We may define therapy as a search for value."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "What is life for? Life is for you."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Education must help us to find the nature of our own being."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "The wisdom of life lies in understanding its complexity yet finding simplicity in its beauty."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "True strength is knowing when to act and when to reflect."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "We are interconnected; the health of one affects the health of all."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Your roots give you grounding, but your wings take you far."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "In the quiet moments, you often find the answers you seek."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Man is but a reed, the weakest in nature, but he is a thinking reed."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The knowledge of God is very far from the love of Him."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The eternal silence of these infinite spaces frightens me."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Curiosity is only vanity."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "To understand is to forgive."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Never complain, never explain. Resist the temptation to defend yourself or make excuses."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Your life is a reflection of your thoughts. If you change your thinking, you change your life."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "The biggest mistake we could ever make in our lives is to think we work for anybody but ourselves."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Integrity is the foundation upon which all other values are built."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "God is never in a hurry, but He is always on time."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you’d have preferred to talk."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "When you are angry or frustrated, what comes out? Whatever it is, it's a good indication of what you're made of."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Problems are inevitable, but your attitude toward them is optional."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The superior man blames himself, the inferior man blames others."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Mistakes are the price we pay for learning."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Character counts; talent might get you there, but character keeps you there."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Leadership is about influence, not authority."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The people will save their government if the government itself will allow them."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "To sin by silence when they should protest makes cowards of men."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Whatever you are, be a good one."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "This country, with its institutions, belongs to the people who inhabit it."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "We fear our highest possibilities."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Courage is the first virtue, as it makes all others possible."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Growth must be chosen again and again; fear must be overcome again and again."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "To step forward into growth, we must leave our comfort zone behind."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "We grow when we face our fears and move through them."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Courage is the bridge between fear and action."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Speaking your truth, even when it trembles, is the essence of bravery."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "It takes courage to stand alone, but even more to stand for others."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Fear is a shadow; step into the light of your courage."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "True courage is daring to begin without knowing the outcome."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Do not fear to make mistakes in your search for truth."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The strength of a man's virtue must not be measured by his efforts, but by his ordinary life."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "You always admire what you really don’t understand."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "It is not good to be too free. It is not good to have everything one wants."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Human beings must be known to be loved; but Divine beings must be loved to be known."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The key to success is action, and the essential in action is perseverance."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Courage is not the absence of fear, but the mastery of fear."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "All successful people, men and women, are big dreamers."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Confidence on the outside begins by living with integrity on the inside."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Don’t be afraid to take big steps; you can’t cross a chasm in two small jumps."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Courage is not limited to the battlefield. It is not only about daring to cross the Red Sea or facing Goliath. Courage is also about staying true to your values."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "God never said that the journey would be easy, but He did say that the arrival would be worthwhile."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "It takes courage to say no to the wrong things and yes to the best things."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "You’re not responsible for the outcome of your obedience; you’re responsible for the obedience."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "True courage is not the absence of fear—it is refusing to let fear control you."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "You never fail until you stop trying."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "True courage is being scared to death but saddling up anyway."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Face challenges head-on; the only way out is through."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Don’t fear failure; fear the absence of progress."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "In the face of adversity, stand tall."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The best way to predict your future is to create it."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "I am a slow walker, but I never walk back."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Whatever you are, be a good one."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Give me six hours to chop down a tree, and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "What a man can be, he must be."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "In any given moment, we have two options: to step forward into growth or step back into safety."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "A musician must make music, an artist must paint, a poet must write, if he is to be ultimately at peace with himself."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "One's only rival is one's own potentialities."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you; they’re supposed to help you discover who you are."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "You don't become who you are by staying in one place."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "If you're always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Singing is a way of connecting to our collective human spirit."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Every time you make a stand, you're shaping the world."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Man's greatness lies in his power of thought."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Do small things as though they were great because of the majesty of Christ who does them in us."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "In faith, there is enough light for those who want to believe and enough shadows to blind those who don’t."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The heart has its reasons, which reason does not know."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Human beings must be known to be loved; but Divine beings must be loved to be known."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Dream big, and then chase it with reckless abandon."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "The only way to predict the future is to create it."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Your limitations are only as strong as your belief in them."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Every sunrise is a new chance to write your story."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Success is not the destination; it's the journey that defines you."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Attitude is more important than facts."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "When you have vision, it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Encouragement is awesome. It has the capacity to lift a man’s shoulders, to spark the flicker of a smile on his face, and bring a sense of purpose to his day."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Success is the peace of mind that comes when you know you’ve given everything you have to give."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Strive for perfection, but never fear failure."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "You take on what you can handle and push yourself to the next level."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Great teams aren’t always great; they’re just great when they have to be."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The one thing that I know is that you win with good people."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The people will save their government if the government itself will allow them."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "I distrust the wisdom if it is inconsistent with humanity."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "It is better to trust and sometimes be disappointed than to always distrust and be miserable."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "The people themselves, and not their servants, can safely reverse their own deliberate decisions."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "We are capable of greater things than we realize."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "The great cause of much psychological illness is the inability to trust one's instincts."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Trusting your inner voice is a step towards self-actualization."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "If you trust yourself, you will inevitably lead yourself towards your fullest potential."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "A secure person trusts the process of life, and they embrace what comes their way."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Trust is the foundation of every relationship, whether personal or societal."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "True trust comes when we open ourselves up to vulnerability."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "You can’t fake trust; it’s built through authenticity and consistency."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Building trust requires time, truth, and transparency."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Trust is like a song—it resonates when it’s real."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Faith is different from proof; the latter is human, the former is a gift of God."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "We never love a person, but only qualities."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "There are two ways to believe: reason and trust."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "We must trust the heart's reasons, for they transcend reason itself."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The knowledge of God is very far from the love of Him."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Trust is the foundation of every unshakable relationship."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Once trust is broken, it takes courage and consistency to rebuild it."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "The most valuable currency in life is trust—it’s earned, not given."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Trust begins where doubt ends."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Honesty is the seed; trust is the tree that grows from it."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Trust is built with consistency."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "God’s sovereignty is the foundation of all trust."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The greatest stress relief is to fully trust God."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "God never asks us to bear tomorrow's burdens with today's grace."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Trust the past to God’s mercy, the present to His love, and the future to His providence."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Winning requires trust between every member of the team."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "You can’t do it alone—it’s about the people you surround yourself with."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Trust is earned, not given, and it’s built through actions, not words."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "A good team trusts each other to do their job well."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Build a culture of trust, and success will take care of itself."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "The path to success is often paved with setbacks."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "The greatest fine art of the future will be the making of a comfortable living from a small piece of land."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "It often requires more courage to dare to do right than to fear to do wrong."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "We must learn to be our own best friends because we fall too easily into self-criticism and self-rejection."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Failure is not falling down but refusing to get up."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "A person grows most through their mistakes."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "When we let go of the fear of failure, we open ourselves to the possibility of success."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Failure is only the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Failure is not the end; it’s a lesson wrapped in disguise."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Every failure carries the seed of a future success."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Don’t let failure define you; let it refine you."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Falling down is a step on the path to rising higher."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Success grows in the soil of failure."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Man is but a reed, the weakest in nature, but he is a thinking reed."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Our achievements are shadows, but we are meant to look at the light that casts them."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The greatest single cause of failure is man's inability to sit quietly in a room."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Evil is easy, and has infinite forms; good is almost unique."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "We fail not by our lack of strength, but by the lack of our understanding."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Failure is the soil where success takes root."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Each failure is a lesson dressed as a disappointment."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Don’t fear failure; fear standing still."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Failure isn’t falling down—it’s refusing to get back up."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Every mistake you make brings you closer to mastery."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Failure is not falling down; it’s staying down."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The road to success is paved with failures."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Failure is often the first step toward something greater."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "God uses our failures to shape us and teach us reliance on Him."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "When you fail, don't fall into self-pity. Instead, rise with resolve."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "You never lose—you either win or learn."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Failure isn’t the end; it’s a chance to begin again with more knowledge."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Losing is painful, but it teaches you how to win."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Mistakes are part of the game; learn from them and move on."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "If you’re not failing, you’re not trying hard enough."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "The best way to predict your future is to create it."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Whatever you are, be a good one."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Give me six hours to chop down a tree, and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "What a man can be, he must be. This need we call self-actualization."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "The story of the human race is the story of men and women selling themselves short."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "A musician must make music, an artist must paint, a poet must write if he is to be ultimately at peace with himself."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Life is a continual process of self-discovery."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "In any given moment, we have two options: to step forward into growth or to step back into safety."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Life's journey is about finding your voice and making it heard."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "We all must learn to embrace change, for it is the essence of life."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Every day is an opportunity to create a new rhythm in your life."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Live boldly, and let the echoes of your actions inspire others."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Music and stories carry the essence of our lives and should be shared."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Man’s greatness lies in his power of thought."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Happiness is neither without us nor within us. It is in God, both without us and within us."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "All of humanity’s problems stem from man’s inability to sit quietly in a room alone."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "We must learn our limits. We are all something, but none of us are everything."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "The eternal silence of these infinite spaces frightens me."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Life is a canvas; paint it with your unique colors."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Every morning is a new story waiting to be told."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "The best chapters in life are the ones you write yourself."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Dream big, live bold, and let your heart be your compass."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Life’s magic happens when you embrace the unknown."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The only way to grow is to embrace change, not resist it."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Joy is a choice, not a result of circumstances."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Life's greatest lessons often come through pain."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "We cannot change our circumstances, but we can change our perspective."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Success is not forever, and failure isn’t fatal."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The one thing that I know is that you win with good people."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The start is what stops most people."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "It’s the extra effort that separates a winner from second place."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "I don’t know any other way to lead but by example."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The better part of one’s life consists of his friendships."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?"
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "I am a success today because I had a friend who believed in me, and I didn’t have the heart to let him down."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "I have always found that mercy bears richer fruits than strict justice."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "A good friend is someone who challenges you to grow and supports you through the process."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Friendship is one of the highest forms of love because it is chosen freely."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "True friends are those who help you become your best self."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "To connect with others deeply, we must first know ourselves."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "A self-actualized person values relationships based on mutual respect and understanding."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "A true friend is one who knows your song and sings it when you've forgotten."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Friends are the mirrors that reflect our best and truest selves."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Friendship is the harmony that binds us together in life's symphony."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "True friends walk with you through the darkest valleys."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "The foundation of friendship is built on trust and shared stories."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Friendship among men is made up of esteem, curiosity, and the pleasure of talking to each other."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Friendship is the comfort, the inexpressible comfort, of feeling safe with a person, having neither to weigh thoughts nor measure words."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "When we are too close to others, we can fail to see their faults."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "True friends are rare and precious, and their absence is keenly felt."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Friends will always ask for proof of your virtues."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Friends are the family we choose for ourselves."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "True friends amplify joy and divide sorrow."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "A good friend knows your stories; a best friend helps you write them."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Friendship isn’t measured in time, but in trust."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Laughter is the glue that holds friendships together."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Friends are God’s way of reminding us we don’t have to go through life alone."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "A true friend walks in when the world walks out."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The best friendships are built on shared values and mutual respect."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Encouragement is the currency of friendship."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "A good friend knows your weaknesses but chooses to focus on your strengths."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Surround yourself with people who challenge and inspire you."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The quality of your relationships determines the quality of your success."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "True friends are those who help you up when everyone else has walked away."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "I’ve learned that life is a team sport; you need good people on your side."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "A friend is someone who helps you see the best version of yourself."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Marriage is not a state of perpetual happiness, but an agreement to grow together."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "No man is good enough to govern another man without that other’s consent."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "I care not for a man’s religion whose dog and cat are not the better for it."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "You cannot build character and courage by taking away a man’s initiative and independence."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "Love is the chain whereby to lock a child to its parent."
quotes.author: Abraham Licoln

quotes.text: "The highest form of love is helping someone achieve their full potential."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "In a loving relationship, each person helps the other become a better version of themselves."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Relationships thrive when there is room for each individual to grow."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "True love is when both partners respect and support each other’s individuality."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "The best relationships are built on mutual respect and understanding."
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: "Healthy relationships are built on the foundation of respect and trust."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Love is a journey of mutual growth, not a destination."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "A strong relationship harmonizes individuality and togetherness."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "Communication is the melody that keeps relationships in tune."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "True love embraces imperfection and grows through understanding."
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson

quotes.text: "The heart has its reasons, of which reason knows nothing."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "To love someone is to acknowledge their imperfections without trying to change them."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Real love begins where nothing is expected in return."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "In relationships, mutual understanding is more valuable than shared interests."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Loving another person means offering a piece of yourself unconditionally."
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: "Love isn’t about finding the perfect person; it’s about learning to see an imperfect person perfectly."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "True love is a dance between patience and passion."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "A relationship is a bridge built on trust, strengthened by communication, and beautified by respect."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "The strongest relationships are built on the smallest acts of kindness."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "Arguments in relationships are not about who’s right but about understanding what’s right for both."
quotes.author: Brian Tarcy

quotes.text: "A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "When relationships are a priority, time becomes irrelevant."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Encouragement is oxygen to the soul in any relationship."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Great marriages are made up of countless small sacrifices."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "Love is a commitment to seek the highest good of the other person."
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.text: "The foundation of any great relationship is trust."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "In relationships, as in coaching, communication is key."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "The effort you put into relationships determines the strength they have."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "Great relationships are built on understanding and mutual respect."
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.text: "You don’t win in life alone; your relationships are your greatest support system."
quotes.author: Don Shula
